text: Chipaŵe pangali ulemwa kukwenu naga nchisosagasosaga umbone wakuuma kwa M'mbuje gwenu (pakusumisyana indu ku Hija), basi pati n'gungumwiche kutyochela ku Arafâti munkolangani Allah pa Mashi’aril Harâm (papali pa Muzdalifah), ni munkumbuchileje yatite pakun'jongola, soni chisimu kala mwaliji mu ŵakusokonechela
